1.title: Button File
1.description: Our premium file holders are ideal for students, professionals, and businesses looking to keep their documents organized and protected. Crafted from sturdy, high-quality materials, these file holders offer excellent durability, secure storage, and a sleek design that’s perfect for both everyday use and professional settings.

2.title: Handle File Holder
2.description: Designed for easy portability and high capacity, our Handle File Holder is perfect for professionals and students who need to carry important documents on the go. With a strong handle, spacious compartments, and durable construction, it keeps your paperwork organized, protected, and easily accessible wherever you are.
features: Sturdy built-in handle for easy carrying
Spacious design to hold multiple documents
Ideal for meetings, interviews, or travel

3.title: Zip File Holder
3.description: Keep your important documents safe and secure with our Zip File Holder. Featuring a smooth zip closure and a sleek design, it’s perfect for carrying certificates, bills, and other papers without worrying about damage or loss. Ideal for office, school, or personal use.
features: Prevents folds, creases, and dust buildup
